lines.text: Occidental decay is nowhere more apparent than in that childish sentimentality of white men for their women.
I can't tell you Japs apart.
You Nazis. I pity the devil when you boys start arriving in bunches.
Four stories high and no fire escape. I wouldn't jump if I were you. You might break every invisible bone in that poor, invisible body.
People who live in transparent bodies shouldn't be so suspicious.
It's good for you to see your friends arrested. It hardens you.
He has his own ideas, and that's dangerous. The Fuhrer doesn't like people who think their own thoughts.
No, just transparent. You wouldn't call a window insane, would you?
Extra! "Oregon State Invites Duke to Rose Bowl." Extra! Late edition! "Oregon State Invites Duke to Rose Bowl."
Our common form of release. It merely states that you've been well-treated and that no one has harmed you.
I can't. You've broken my fingers. You...
